pullRequest.title: D2 relative strategy integration test
pullRequest.bodyText:
Changes include:

A test framework to provide different call count, latency, error rate in multiple intervals to test load balancer strategies. Users can plugin different behaviors to perform all the scenario tests.
The actual integration test for RelativeLoadBalancer. Some of the tests run against both relative strategy and the old degrader strategy, and verify the expected behaviors are the same.

+package com.linkedin.d2.balancer.strategies.relative;
+
+import java.net.URI;
+import java.util.Map;
+
+
+/**
+ * The helper class for {@link RelativeLoadBalancerStrategy} related tests
+ */
+public class RelativeLoadBalancerTestHelper {
+
+  /**
+   * Get points map for a given partition
+   *
+   * @param strategy The object of the strategy
+   * @param partitionId The id of the partition
+   * @return The points map
+   */
+  public static Map<URI, Integer> getPointsMap(RelativeLoadBalancerStrategy strategy, int partitionId)
+  {
+    return strategy.getPointsMap(partitionId);

nodes.bodyText: We should have an interface to expose pointsMap (not only for testing) because we'll have MBean to expose the values to inGraphs.

commit.message: Use unmodified map for point map
